description: Procurement notice for an independent power supply for the flight data recorders of the Dash 7 and Dash 8 aircraft, with amendments to the solicitation and closing time.
full_summary:
# Recorder Independent Power Supply Tender Invitation
### Tender Information

#### Tender Title
- English: Recorder Independent Power Supply
- French: Alimentation électrique indépendante de l'enregistreur de vol

#### Tender Reference
- WS4485126092-Doc4485382002

#### Tender Status
- English: Expired
- French: Expiré

### Tender Details

* Publication Date: March 12, 2024
* Closing Date: March 18, 2024 (14:00:00)
* Amendment Date: March 13, 2024
* Expected Contract Start Date: March 19, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 17, 2025

### Procurement Information

* Procurement Category: Goods
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective tendering
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

### Goods Requirements

* UNSPSC: * 25200000, 25201702, 25202003
* UNSPSC Description: Aerospace systems and components and equipment, Flight data recorders, Aircraft power supply units

### Delivery and Contact Information

* Region of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)
* End User Entity: Department of Transport (TC)
* Contact Person: Long, Rick (SPAC/PSPC)  
End: rick.long@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
 
### Terms and Conditions
The request for proposal will be issued with the appropriate CanadaBuys Standard Instructions and General Conditions. Only qualified Supply Arrangement holders for procurement of T8493-140035 series for the Dash 7 and Dash 8 Aircraft Fleet will be considered for this tender.

Please note that there has been an amendment to the closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by March 15, 2024 at 14:00 EDT. Any bids submitted after this time will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.  I expect the rewritten entry to be around 400 words. I've rephrased the technical details in a way that's easier to understand and follow. I used clear headings and subheadings to make the text easier to read. I formatted the essentials of the tender in a clean, easy-to-read layout. I made sure to include all the relevant information while omitting the redundant information.
